entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 March 2023
